about_the_game:
Behold, the Major Arcana set of digital Tarot cards! It includes 22 Tavern Talk-themed and wonderfully illustrated print-ready cards for you to admire and indulge in. Let's see what the future has in store for you and the world of Asteria. You will get the set as a print-ready PDF for your personal use only!

To access this content please do the following:
  • Right click the product in your Steam Library and select "Properties".
  • Under the "Local Files" tab, select "Browse...".
  • Within the product's local files, locate a folder that has a similar name to the content you are searching for.
